title: Video Editor - Premier Pro Specialist
job_overview:
Looking for a hard working, detail-obsessed video editor who lives and breathes Adobe Premiere Pro.
Your role will be to cut high-quality video ads (including Meta, YouTube and TV streaming) that are visually striking, emotionally engaging, and designed to sell.

Responsibilities:
- Edit raw footage or AI generated clips into compelling short-form ads (15s, 30s, 60s) using Adobe Premiere Pro
- Create multiple versions for different platforms (Meta, YouTube, TV, etc.)
- Sync footage with voiceover, SFX, and licensed music
- Add transitions, typography, simple motion graphics and pacing to match ad strategy 
- Colour grade and audio balance clips to a professional finish

Work fast, take feedback well, and meet deadlines. 

Requirements:
- Expert in Adobe Premiere Pro (After Effects is a bonus)
- Portfolio showcasing ad-style editing â€” ideally in luxury, lifestyle or digital brands. 
- Strong eye for composition, pacing, and tone
- Able to edit in different styles and eras (e.g. 70s-inspired, cinematic, fast-cut digital ads)
- Basic colour correction and grading experience
- Familiar with exporting in multiple formats and aspect ratios (e.g. 16:9, 9:16, 1:1)
- Understands how to cut to emotion and brand tone, not just assemble clips
- Fluent in English and able to communicate clearly via email


Skills in AI generation (VEO & Leonardo) is a bonus but not essential.

If you meet these requirements, please send:
- A quick intro
- Your 3 best video edits 
- Your monthly rate

*Please only respond if you are dedicated.

Thanks!
Blake
